instance.message.authentication-code: Instance requires to authenticate Minecraft account. Authentication pending.
instance.message.no-autoconnect: Minecraft instance is set to not auto connect. A manual connect signal is needed to start.
instance.message.minecraft-kicked: Minecraft account has been kicked off the server.
instance.message.internet-problems: Failed to establish secure connection. Trying again in 30 seconds...
instance.message.failed-too-many-times: Client failed to connect too many times. No further trying to reconnect.
instance.message.version-incompatible: Minecraft account has been kicked off Hypixel due to incompatibility version. Maybe it needs an update.
instance.message.logged-from-another-loc: Someone logged in from another place.Won't try to re-login.
instance.message.xbox-down: Microsoft XBOX service is down. Will retry again soon.
instance.message.xbox-throttled: Microsoft XBOX service throttled due to too many requests. Will retry again soon.
instance.message.no-account: Does the account own minecraft? changing skin and reconnecting might help fix the problem.
instance.message.proxy-problem: Encountered a problem while working with Minecraft instance proxy.
instance.message.restarting: Minecraft instance will try to restart soon.
discord.status.chat-failed: Chat with {{instanceName}} has been permanently interrupted. Manual intervention is required!
discord.status.chat-notice: Something happened with {{instanceName}} that may require intervention.
discord.commands.settings.header1: Options marked with $t(discord.commands.settings.essential) are essential. Change at your own risk.
discord.commands.settings.header2: Options marked with $t(discord.commands.settings.recommended) are recommended for quality of life.
discord.commands.settings.header3: Options marked with $t(discord.commands.settings.warning) should only be messed with if you know what you are doing.
discord.commands.settings.main.title: Main
discord.commands.settings.main.descripti:
Welcome to Application options!
You can choose one of the categories below to expand it.

$t(discord.commands.settings.header)
commands.explain: {{username}}, I am a robot that connects this chat to discord! I have many commands you can use, see them all with {{commandPrefix}}commands
commands.error.must-be-ingame: {{username}}, Can only use this command in-game!
commands.error.must-be-admin: {{username}}, You must be an admin to use this command!
commands.error.never-joined-hypixel: {{username}} has never played on Hypixel before?
